title: Slayer’s Book of Death /// Part 2 /// 405
description:
Slayer’s Book of Death /// Part 2 /// 405

Part 2 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

In summer of 1993 in rural Texas, a hunter makes a shocking discovery on a trek though the woods. He found a rusty old cooler. Inside there were several skulls and some notebooks. The notebooks were titled The Slayer’s Book of Death - volumes one through four.
Beer of the Week - Rising Haze by Highland Brewing Garage Grade - 5 out of 5 bottle caps
